channel.title: Making it show the players name in Bank [PI] [SOLVED]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ilhbpj.png[/img] That's the words my bank currently displays I want it to show the players name instead though like The bank of "Players name here" That's my current code in my playerassistant.java class I just forgot how to do this I know you have to load it such as in this code which displays players online instead of players name [code] c.getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "[b]+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+[/b] " ", 39155); //quest journal title[/code]
[code]sendFrame126("The bank of Cyanogen Project.", 5383);[/code] So if you know how to do this or could help me it would be great, thank you.

item.title: Making it show the players name in Bank [PI] [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

That’s it thank you!
